body_html:
Hi !
The 0.7.0 tag version is what I actually use inside docker with the udacity project and it is compatible with the version 0.12.1 of tensorflow [print(tf.--version--) in the notebook].
With this version the last update of initializer : tf.global_variables_initializer() is applied but not with the 0.6.0 tag.
So if you release another version, please udpate the readme so that everyone be informed, the new initializer is faster.

With this version the last update of initializer : tf.global_variables_initializer() is applied but not with the 0.6.0 tag.

body:
Hi !
The 0.7.0 tag version is what I actually use inside docker **with the udacity project** and it is compatible with the version 0.12.1 of tensorflow [**print(tf.--version--)** in the notebook].
With this version the last update of initializer : **tf.global_variables_initializer()** is applied but not with the 0.6.0 tag.
So if you release another version, please udpate the readme so that everyone be informed, the new initializer is faster.
